title: Willie McGinest Interview, Nike NFL Innovation in Cleats, Uniforms (Football 07/06)
description:
Will Brinson is briefly joined by Willie McGinest to talk about the Patriots and then chats up Tyler Luckey and Joe Rogers of Nike about the potential changes and innovation coming to the cleats and uniforms NFL players will have moving forward.
